item.title: Natural Language Understanding for Conversational AI
item.description: Summary Natural Language Understanding (NLU) is an important field of Natural Language Processing, which enables several applications ranging from question answering to fully automated conversational agents. In practice, the NLU is the first step of a conversational agent that processes the userâ€™s raw utterance.
